description:
I was very excited to meet Byron. Not because he practically defines the “guy next door.” But because it’s usually the guys with the perfect smile and endearing eyes that have that fun wild streak in them and are not afraid to let it loose.
Byron just turned 21 and has no reservations whatsoever when it comes to sex. In fact he is quite inquisitive about it and asked a lot of questions while he was here. His eyes glowed with anticipation while we talked — almost as if he wanted to get naked right away and start jerking off. You just can't say “no” to that kind of eagerness! His body is near perfection — beefy chest, washboard abs, thick legs and a big muscled ass you could spend days in. He is very confident but blushed a little when I asked him to show me how he kept his ass in such perfect shape.
The best part about Byron was that he was very comfortable and open about everything. He's definitely no angel and has even been involved in a four-some. He enjoys the fact that he can be both a good and bad boy depending on who is around and that he can get away with it. He’s very social and he is loving his college years with friends and hitting the bars.
“I just like meeting new people,” he said. “That’s what life is about.”
title: Byron
